1: %% @doc Unit tests for router_core:route/2 + Telemetry contract
    2: %% Verifies that telemetry:span/3 contract is correctly followed
    3: -module(router_core_telemetry_contract_SUITE).
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: -include("beamline_router.hrl").
    6: 
    7: -export([all/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
    8: -export([
    9:     test_route_returns_tuple_with_metadata/1,
   10:     test_route_telemetry_stop_event_no_exception/1,
   11:     test_route_error_returns_correct_format/1,
   12:     test_route_success_returns_correct_format/1
   13: ]).
   14: 
   15: all() ->
   16:     [
   17:         test_route_returns_tuple_with_metadata,
   18:         test_route_telemetry_stop_event_no_exception,
   19:         test_route_error_returns_correct_format,
   20:         test_route_success_returns_correct_format
   21:     ].
   22: 
   23: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   24:     _ = application:load(beamline_router),
   25:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, grpc_port, 0),
   26:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, grpc_enabled, false),
   27:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, nats_mode, mock),
   28:     case application:ensure_all_started(beamline_router) of
   29:         {ok, _} ->
   30:             timer:sleep(200),
   31:             Config;
   32:         Error ->
   33:             ct:fail("Failed to start beamline_router: ~p", [Error])
   34:     end.
   35: 
   36: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   37:     application:stop(beamline_router),
   38:     Config.
   39: 
   40: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   41:     Config.
   42: 
   43: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   44:     Config.
   45: 
   46: %% Test: route/2 returns {Result, StopMetadata} tuple
   47: test_route_returns_tuple_with_metadata(_Config) ->
   48:     %% Create valid route request
   49:     Message = #{
   50:         <<"message_id">> => <<"test-msg">>,
   51:         <<"tenant_id">> => <<"test_tenant">>,
   52:         <<"message_type">> => <<"chat">>,
   53:         <<"payload">> => <<"test">>
   54:     },
   55:     RouteRequest = #route_request{
   56:         message = Message,
   57:         policy_id = undefined,
   58:         context = #{}
   59:     },
   60:     
   61:     %% Create a test policy first
   62:     Policy = #policy{
   63:         tenant_id = <<"test_tenant">>,
   64:         policy_id = <<"default">>,
   65:         weights = #{<<"openai">> => 1.0}
   66:     },
   67:     ok = router_policy_store:upsert_policy(<<"test_tenant">>, Policy, undefined),
   68:     
   69:     %% Call route/2
   70:     Result = router_core:route(RouteRequest, #{}),
   71:     
   72:     %% Verify it returns {Result, StopMetadata} tuple
   73:     case Result of
   74:         {{ok, #route_decision{}}, StopMetadata} when is_map(StopMetadata) ->
   75:             %% Extract and verify StopMetadata
   76:             true = maps:is_key(tenant_id, StopMetadata),
   77:             true = maps:is_key(policy_id, StopMetadata),
   78:             true = maps:is_key(result, StopMetadata),
   79:             ok;
   80:         _ ->
   81:             ct:fail("Expected {{ok, #route_decision{}}, StopMetadata}, got: ~p", [Result])
   82:     end,
   83:     
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: %% Test: Telemetry stop event doesn't throw exception
   87: test_route_telemetry_stop_event_no_exception(_Config) ->
   88:     %% Track telemetry events
   89:     Events = ets:new(telemetry_events, [set, private]),
   90:     HandlerId = {?MODULE, test_telemetry_contract},
   91:     
   92:     telemetry:attach(HandlerId, [router_core, route, stop],
   93:         fun(_Event, Measurements, Metadata, _) ->
   94:             ets:insert(Events, {stop, Measurements, Metadata})
   95:         end, #{}),
   96:     
   97:     telemetry:attach(HandlerId, [router_core, route, exception],
   98:         fun(_Event, Measurements, Metadata, _) ->
   99:             ets:insert(Events, {exception, Measurements, Metadata})
  100:         end, #{}),
  101:     
  102:     %% Create valid route request
  103:     Message = #{
  104:         <<"message_id">> => <<"test-msg">>,
  105:         <<"tenant_id">> => <<"test_tenant">>,
  106:         <<"message_type">> => <<"chat">>,
  107:         <<"payload">> => <<"test">>
  108:     },
  109:     RouteRequest = #route_request{
  110:         message = Message,
  111:         policy_id = undefined,
  112:         context = #{}
  113:     },
  114:     
  115:     %% Create a test policy first
  116:     Policy = #policy{
  117:         tenant_id = <<"test_tenant">>,
  118:         policy_id = <<"default">>,
  119:         weights = #{<<"openai">> => 1.0}
  120:     },
  121:     ok = router_policy_store:upsert_policy(<<"test_tenant">>, Policy, undefined),
  122:     
  123:     %% Call route/2 - should not throw exception
  124:     try
  125:         Result = router_core:route(RouteRequest, #{}),
  126:         case Result of
  127:             {{ok, #route_decision{}}, _StopMetadata} ->
  128:                 ok;
  129:             _ ->
  130:                 ct:fail("Expected {{ok, #route_decision{}}, _StopMetadata}, got: ~p", [Result])
  131:         end,
  132:         
  133:         timer:sleep(200),  %% Allow telemetry to process
  134:         
  135:         %% Verify stop event was emitted (not exception)
  136:         case ets:lookup(Events, stop) of
  137:             [{stop, _Measurements, _Metadata}] ->
  138:                 ok;  %% Expected
  139:             [] ->
  140:                 ct:fail("Telemetry stop event was not emitted")
  141:         end,
  142:         
  143:         %% Verify no exception event
  144:         [] = ets:lookup(Events, exception),
  145:         
  146:         ok
  147:     catch
  148:         Class:Error:Stacktrace ->
  149:             telemetry:detach(HandlerId),
  150:             ets:delete(Events),
  151:             ct:fail("Exception thrown: ~p:~p~n~p", [Class, Error, Stacktrace])
  152:     end,
  153:     
  154:     telemetry:detach(HandlerId),
  155:     ets:delete(Events),
  156:     ok.
  157: 
  158: %% Test: Error case returns correct format
  159: test_route_error_returns_correct_format(_Config) ->
  160:     %% Create route request with missing tenant_id
  161:     Message = #{
  162:         <<"message_id">> => <<"test-msg">>
  163:         %% tenant_id missing
  164:     },
  165:     RouteRequest = #route_request{
  166:         message = Message,
  167:         policy_id = undefined,
  168:         context = #{}
  169:     },
  170:     
  171:     %% Call route/2
  172:     Result = router_core:route(RouteRequest, #{}),
  173:     
  174:     %% Verify it returns {error, StopMetadata} tuple
  175:     case Result of
  176:         {{error, {missing_tenant_id, _Context}}, StopMetadata} when is_map(StopMetadata) ->
  177:             %% Extract and verify StopMetadata
  178:             error = maps:get(result, StopMetadata),
  179:             true = maps:is_key(error, StopMetadata),
  180:             ok;
  181:         _ ->
  182:             ct:fail("Expected {{error, {missing_tenant_id, _Context}}, StopMetadata}, got: ~p", [Result])
  183:     end,
  184:     
  185:     ok.
  186: 
  187: %% Test: Success case returns correct format
  188: test_route_success_returns_correct_format(_Config) ->
  189:     %% Create valid route request
  190:     Message = #{
  191:         <<"message_id">> => <<"test-msg">>,
  192:         <<"tenant_id">> => <<"test_tenant">>,
  193:         <<"message_type">> => <<"chat">>,
  194:         <<"payload">> => <<"test">>
  195:     },
  196:     RouteRequest = #route_request{
  197:         message = Message,
  198:         policy_id = undefined,
  199:         context = #{}
  200:     },
  201:     
  202:     %% Create a test policy first
  203:     Policy = #policy{
  204:         tenant_id = <<"test_tenant">>,
  205:         policy_id = <<"default">>,
  206:         weights = #{<<"openai">> => 1.0}
  207:     },
  208:     ok = router_policy_store:upsert_policy(<<"test_tenant">>, Policy, undefined),
  209:     
  210:     %% Call route/2
  211:     Result = router_core:route(RouteRequest, #{}),
  212:     
  213:     %% Verify it returns {ok, StopMetadata} tuple
  214:     case Result of
  215:         {{ok, Decision}, StopMetadata} when is_map(StopMetadata) ->
  216:             %% Extract and verify StopMetadata
  217:             ok = maps:get(result, StopMetadata),
  218:             true = maps:is_key(provider_id, StopMetadata),
  219:             true = maps:is_key(reason, StopMetadata),
  220:             Decision#route_decision.provider_id =:= maps:get(provider_id, StopMetadata),
  221:             ok;
  222:         _ ->
  223:             ct:fail("Expected {{ok, #route_decision{}}, StopMetadata}, got: ~p", [Result])
  224:     end,
  225:     
  226:     ok.
  227:
